professional_summary: Experienced Database Administrator with expertise in Oracle, SQL Server, and PL/SQL. Proven track record in database management, performance tuning, disaster recovery, and security integration.

key_responsibilities: Managed and optimized Oracle databases for performance and availability.
Implemented backup and recovery strategies using RMAN and Data Pump.
Monitored and resolved performance bottlenecks utilizing AWR
Administered user access and security policies across multiple platforms.
and migrated Oracle databases on AIX platforms.
Monitored databases using Oracle Enterprise Manager (OEM) Grid Control.
Performed database migrations and upgrades to improve system performance.
Implemented disaster recovery solutions using Data Guard and physical standby databases.
